results.title: LILAC pilot study: Effects of metformin on mTOR activation and HIV reservoir persistence during antiretroviral therapy
results.text_hl: @GENE_CD4 @GENE_920 @@@CD4@@@+ T-cell counts, @GENE_CD4 @GENE_920 @@@CD4@@@+/@GENE_CD8A @GENE_925 @@@CD8@@@+ T-cell ratios, plasma markers of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Winter_Shortland_Temple_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536735 @@@gut damage@@@, as well as levels of cell-associated integrated @SPECIES_11676 @@@HIV@@@-DNA and @SPECIES_11676 @@@HIV@@@-RNA, and transcriptionally-inducible @SPECIES_11676 @@@HIV@@@ reservoirs, underwent minor variations in the blood in response to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Retrospective analysis of the effects of a highly standardized mixture of Berberis aristata, Silybum marianum, and monacolins K and KA in diabetic patients with dyslipidemia
results.text_hl: Consequently, @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@berberine@@@-based therapies are suggested by physicians for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Irritable_Bowel_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D043183 @@@IBS@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Winter_Shortland_Temple_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536735 @@@gut@@@ discomfort caused by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
